name: Apportionment of business income; percentage
text: §235-29  Apportionment of business income; percentage.  All business income shall be apportioned to this State by multiplying the income by a fraction, the numerator of which is the property factor plus the payroll factor plus the sales factor, and the denominator of which is three. [L 1967, c 33, pt of §1; HRS §235-29]
